name: Medha ðŸŒ¸
wishText: To someone who touches each life you enter, spreading joy to everyone you meet: may the love and happiness you share with others return to you tenfold. For your birthday, I just want to say: I hope you can see how special you are to me. Happy birthday, my love!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
